titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing access to medical care to all citizens of the United States.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E353)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Declares that the right of U.S. citizens to medical care shall be guaranteed.
